information.title: A haven of peace in the heart of Andalusia
information.text: Twenty years ago, a love at first sight for Olvera sparked a dream: to one day settle in this sun-drenched white village. Today, that dream has come true, and it is with great joy that we welcome you to Casa Cal y Sol. Located in the historic center, our house combines Andalusian charm, modern comfort, and absolute tranquility. Everything is here to make you feel at home.

firstText.title: A dream come true
firstText.text: Twenty years ago, we discovered Olvera and instantly fell under the spell of this white village in the heart of Andalusia. Its sunny streets, warm atmosphere, and authenticity immediately won us over. Since then, a dream began to take shape: to settle here for our retirement. That moment has finally arrived, and it is with great joy that we open the doors of Casa Cal y Sol, a place where we hope you'll feel just as at home as we do.

description.title: Discover the house

1.title: Living room:
1.text: Wi-Fi, television, two and three-seater sofas, game console, board games.

2.title: Bedroom 1:
2.text: Two single beds, stackable and movable.

1.title: Kitchen:
1.text: Electric oven, induction hob, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, microwave oven, coffee maker, toaster, kettle, citrus press, hand blender. All the cookware needed for 8 people.

2.title: Cellar:
2.text: Washing machine, vacuum cleaner, ironing board, iron, clothes rack.

description.patio_button: A small patio with direct access from the kitchen.
description.terrace1_button: A large, semi-covered terrace houses the relaxation and dining areas, with a corner sofa, chairs and loungers, an aluminum and tempered glass table, chairs for eight, a gas griddle barbecue, a manual awning and two parasols.
description.pool_button: A second terrace with a swimming pool (lighted and with an outdoor shower).
description.rooftop_button: The rooftop offers spectacular views of the church, the castle, and the olive groves.

global_button.1: Reversible air conditioning in all rooms. Double-glazed windows and doors with roller shutters.

1.title: En-suite bathroom:
1.text: Two sinks, hairdryer, bathtub and toilet.

4.title: Bedroom 3:
4.text: Two single beds, wardrobe and dresser.

2.title: Conditions
2.text: Reservation: 30% of the price of the stay.

4.title: Cancellation
4.text: No refunds for weekly stays cancelled less than 10 days in advance, or weekends cancelled less than 3 days in advance.

olvera.title: Everyday life in Olvera
olvera.text: Our house offers all the advantages of the city while preserving the authenticity of a village. Less than 100 meters away, you'll find supermarkets, a butcher, greengrocer, bakery, pharmacy, bars, and much more (our recommendations are listed below). In addition to all these amenities, the house also features a private 3x4m pool to cool off under the Andalusian sun. Located on the quiet Calle Peñón, where only the baker and garbage collectors pass daily, our house guarantees peace and serenity. Parking is available nearby.

andalusia.title: A privileged geographical location
andalusia.text: Casa Cal y Sol is located in the historic center of Olvera, just steps away from a 12th-century Arab castle and its neoclassical church—true symbols of the town. Ideally situated on the Route of the White Villages, the house is only 1.5 hours from Seville and Malaga airports, as well as from the beaches and main cultural sites of Andalusia. Nearby, the Via Verde de la Sierra invites you to explore the region on foot, by bike, or on horseback, and thrill-seekers can try paragliding in Algodonales.

info.1: Free for children under two years old
info.2: 10% discount for stays of 8 nights or more
info.3: Booking available up to 3 days before arrival
